content.question: Which of the following questions best addresses whether a particular inhibitor is competitive or noncompetitive?

choices.label: Does the inhibitor bind more tightly to the substrate or to the enzyme?
Can the inhibitor be converted to product by the enzyme?
How much inhibitor is necessary to completely inhibit the activity of the enzyme?
Does the inhibitor bind to an allosteric site or the active site of the enzyme?

content.answer: Does the inhibitor bind to an allosteric site or the active site of the enzyme?

skill.text: 3.A: Identify or pose a testable question based on an observation, data, or a model.
